lc_content:
Contact
Catalyst Learning Center
Ann Novitske -- President, Treasurer, Board Member, and Tutor
email: ann@catalystlc.org
Catalyst Learning Center
Richard Kaleta -- Secretary, Board Member and Tutor
email: richard@catalystlc.org
Catalyst Learning Center
Rachel Tollefson -- Board Member and Tutor
email: rachel.a.tollefson@gmail.com
Get Involved! Currently, this project is primarily a volunteer effort. Our vision includes growing our volunteer corps & possibly hiring "pre-career" tutors so that we can expand to other libraries and help more students. As a young organization, we're looking for lots of help. If you want to get involved as a tutor or a charitable donor, please contact us for more information.
Financial Donations Interested in helping Catalyst achieve its mission, but don't have time right now to tutor? Make a tax deductible donation today!
Catalyst is a registered 501(c)(3) with the Internal Revenue Service. Any contribution to Catalyst is fully tax deductible.
